name: Volatile Inkweaver
description: A grotesque amalgamation of rat and squid, the Volatile Inkweaver's body is covered in pulsating bioluminescent sacs that emit a sickly green glow. Four thick tentacles sprout from its back, constantly writhing and dripping with corrosive ink.
dialogue: Pthhhpt! (Air expelled forcefully through its beak)
Snip snip... (Sounds of ink being cut with sharp teeth)
Glurp glurp... (Liquid gurgling in its stomach)
Splurt! Splurt! (Ink sprays rapidly from multiple tentacles)
Kshhh... (A wet, sucking sound as it retracts a tentacle)

flavor.rationale: The Inkweaver's existence is attributed to the unchecked flow of industrial waste and experimental bioluminescent chemicals into the city sewers. The chemical compounds reacted with local rat populations, triggering rapid mutation, while their proximity to abandoned squid farms provided genetic material for the formation of tentacles.
